mapper.sql: user_id, user_nickname, user_signature, head_image_url, birthday, gender, email, phone_number, password, user_last_login_time, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into user
user_id,
user_nickname,
user_signature,
head_image_url,
birthday,
gender,
email,
phone_number,
password,
user_last_login_time,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{headImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{gender,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user
user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_signature = #{userSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_image_url = #{headImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_last_login_time = #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set user_nickname = #{userNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_signature = #{userSignature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_image_url = #{headImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_last_login_time = #{userLastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select password, user_id from user where phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
select head_image_url from user where user_id = #{userId}

select user.user_id, ifnull(user.user_nickname, '渣渣辉'), ifnull(user.user_signature, '该用户还没有设置个性签名') from user, user_focus where user_focus.my_user_id = #{userId} and user.user_id = user_focus.focus_user_id
